Description: This guitar was used in a smoke free, climate controlled home recording studio and on some live shows. There is almost no wear except for an abrasion or nitro finish damage on the bottom of the guitar from the strap, ( see photo #7) which cannot be readily seen from the front or back of the guitar...a few very fine scratches and a small smudge or two from sweat which are only visible depending on the light. It comes with the original G&G Hardshell Case, all the original accessories, including a strap and cable and all the original tags. I am including fresh unopened strings. Plays and sounds great. Please, no low ball offers. Free Shipping to lower 48 US States.... Fender Eric Johnson Signature Stratocaster Unique Features:1-Piece quartersawn soft "V" shape vintage tinted Maple neck.Extra-smooth neck to headstock volute.Special neckplate with engraved EJ and Kokopelli.2-Piece deep-contoured '57 style lightweight Alder body.1957-style body cavities.12" radius fingerboard.Countersunk holes in pickguard for pickup mounting screws.Height-staggered vintage-style tuners, which eliminate the need for string trees.Vintage tremolo with silver-painted block and '57-style string recess (No paint between base plate and block).5 Tremolo springs and no-back tremolo cover plate.Deluxe blonde hardshell case with black ends (black interior), strap, cable, tremolo bar. Fender Eric Johnson Signature Stratocaster Specs:Color: 2-Color Sunburst.Body Type: Double Cutaway.Finish: Nitro cellulose.Neck Wood: One-piece quarter sawn maple, 12" radiusNeck Shape: Light V.Body Wood: Light 2-piece alder body 57-style.Machine Heads: Staggered vintage style.No. of Frets: 21 highly polished Medium Jumbo.Pickguard: 1-Ply Parchment (8 Hole).Scale Length: 25.5".Pickups: 3 Special Design Custom Shop Eric Johnson Pickups w/countersink screws.Controls: Master Volume, Neck Tone, Bridge Tone.Bridge/Tailpiece: Vintage Tremolo with five springs.Pickup Switching: 5-way switch.Hardware: Nickel/Chrome.
Title: Fender Eric Johnson Signature Stratocaster 2 Color Sunburst
ConditionDescription: Excellent Condition...has small abrasion and/or nitro finish damage on bottom of guitar likely from vinyl on guitar strap reacting with nitro cellulose finish, not as bad as it looks and cannot be readily seen from the back or front, otherwise very little wear.
